unnormalised: Regarding the UPI transaction limit, current regulations by RBI stipulate a max of ₹1 lakh per transaction, although some apps like PhonePe may have their own daily limits such as ₹50,000, depending on KYC status. It's best to check directly with your bank or payment service provider for specific details & potential updates as of 2024-01-01.
normalised: Regarding the U-P-I transaction limit, current regulations by R-B-I stipulate a maximum of rupee one lakh per transaction, although some apps like PhonePe may have their own daily limits such as rupee fifty thousand, depending on K-Y-C status. It's best to check directly with your bank or payment service provider for specific details and potential updates as of first January two thousand and twenty four.
